udaharana – danata jathika adhyapana widyapitawala palamu wasara guru sisun lesa guru puhunuwa labanne 2013 warshaye a.po.sa. (u.pela) parikshanayata peni siti ayayi. 2013 warshaye adhyayana podu sahathika pathra usas pela samathun wishwawidyalawala sidu karanne owunge thunwana wasare adhyayana katayuthuya. 2014 warshaye adhyayana podu sahathika pathra usas pela samathungen wishwawidyalawalata bandawagath aya owunge dewana wasara adhyapana katayuthu sidu karaddi jathika adhyapana widyapitawalata 2014 warshaye samathun thawamath bandawagena natha.
